title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued Thursday, with Alexander Bublik and Learner Tien among the first-round winners. Rome

Bublik, Tien win first-round matches

May 09, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued Thursday, with Alexander Bublik and Learner Tien among the first-round winners. Fabian Marozsan edged Joao Fonseca, while Fabio Fognini's Rome farewell ended with defeat to Jacob Fearnley.

View all the Rome tennis results from Thursday below.

Results - Thursday, 08 May 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 96
ATP - Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) d Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) 64 63
ATP - Jacob Fearnley (GBR) d [WC] Fabio Fognini (ITA) 62 63

ATP - [WC] Luca Nardi (ITA) d Flavio Cobolli (ITA) 63 64
